songs.title: Asia's orphan
lyrics: 亚细亚的孤儿　在风中哭泣
黄色的脸孔有红色的污泥
黑色的眼珠有白色的恐惧
西风在东方唱著悲伤的歌曲
亚细亚的孤儿　在风中哭泣
没有人要和你玩平等的游戏
每个人都想要你心爱的玩具
亲爱的孩子你为何哭泣
多少人在追寻那解不开的问题
多少人在深夜里无奈的叹息
多少人的眼泪在无言中抹去
亲爱的母亲这是什么真理
English Translation:
Asia's orphan crying in the wind
Yellow faces with red mud
Black eyes with white fear
The west wind sings a sorrowful song in the east
Asia's orphan crying in the wind
No one wants to play fair games with you
Everyone wants to steal your beloved toy
Dear child why are you crying
How many people are seeking unsolvable questions
How many people sigh helplessly in the dead of night
How many people's tears are wiped away in silence
Dear mother what is this truth

songs.title: Four Verses of Homesickness
lyrics: 给我一瓢长江水啊长江水
那酒一样的长江水
那醉酒的滋味是乡愁的滋味
给我一瓢长江水啊长江水
给我一张海棠红啊海棠红
那血一样的海棠红
那沸血的烧痛是乡愁的烧痛
给我一张海棠红啊海棠红
给我一片雪花白啊雪花白
那信一样的雪花白
那家信的等待是乡愁的等待
给我一片雪花白啊雪花白
给我一朵腊梅香啊腊梅香
那母亲一样的腊梅香
那母亲的芬芳是乡土的芬芳
给我一朵腊梅香啊腊梅香
English Translation:
Give me a ladle of Yangtze River water ah Yangtze River water
That Yangtze River water like wine
That taste of drunkenness is the taste of nostalgia
Give me a ladle of Yangtze River water ah Yangtze River water
Give me a begonia red ah begonia red
That begonia red like blood
That burning pain of boiling blood is the pain of nostalgia
Give me a begonia red ah begonia red
Give me a snow white ah snow white
That snow white like a letter
That waiting for a letter from home is the waiting of nostalgia
Give me a snow white ah snow white
Give me a winter plum fragrance ah winter plum fragrance
That winter plum fragrance like mother
That fragrance of mother is the fragrance of homeland
Give me a winter plum fragrance ah winter plum fragrance

songs.title: Stories of Time
lyrics: 春天的花开秋天的风以及冬天的落阳
忧郁的青春年少的我曾经无知的这么想
风车在四季轮回的歌里它天天的流转
风花雪月的诗句里我在年年的成长
流水它带走光阴的故事改变了一个人
就在那多愁善感而初次等待的青春
发黄的相片古老的信以及褪色的圣诞卡
年轻时为你写的歌恐怕你早已忘了吧
过去的誓言就像那课本里缤纷的书签
刻画着多少美丽的诗可是终究是一阵烟
流水它带走光阴的故事改变了两个人
就在那多愁善感而初次流泪的青春
遥远的路程昨日的梦以及远去的笑声
再次的见面我们又历经了多少的路程
不再是旧日熟悉的我有着旧日狂热的梦
也不是旧日熟悉的你有着依然的笑容
流水它带走光阴的故事改变了我们
就在那多愁善感而初次回忆的青春
流水它带走光阴的故事改变了我们
就在那多愁善感而初次回忆的青春
English Translation:
Spring flowers bloom, autumn wind blows, and winter sun sets
In my melancholic youth, I once thought so naively
The windmill turns in the song of four seasons circling
In poems of wind, flowers, snow and moon, I grow year after year
Flowing water carries away the stories of time, changing one person
Just in that sentimental and first waiting youth
Yellowed photographs, ancient letters, and faded Christmas cards
The songs I wrote for you in youth, I'm afraid you've forgotten them long ago
Past vows are like colorful bookmarks in textbooks
Drawing so many beautiful poems but ultimately just wisps of smoke
Flowing water carries away the stories of time, changing two people
Just in that sentimental and first tearful youth
Distant roads, yesterday's dreams, and fading laughter
Meeting again, how much road have we traveled
I'm no longer the familiar me with yesterday's passionate dreams
You're no longer the familiar you with the same smile
Flowing water carries away the stories of time, changing us
Just in that sentimental and first reminiscing youth
Flowing water carries away the stories of time, changing us
Just in that sentimental and first reminiscing youth
